text: foreign
where do you think I'm going
going home Lewis oh don't you get it
they're all gone every single one of

no I don't think you understand I'm not

tonight's not the night to call Harvey
why because Mike I don't know if you've

well then what the hell are we going to

would you like some more drinks

what do you think we should do since it
was your recommendation that landed Us

don't you get it the rest didn't go to

I came down here to figure out what the
